text:
Imo State Governor is commissioning a COVID-19 isolation centre like an actual project and even invited press.

As if the commissioning was not bad enough, man had someone design a COVID-19 face cap to match the reflective jacket.

From Okorocha to this... God why??? 😭😭😭 https://t.co/9XLIdGRA5g
